trans-unit.source: .NET Core CLI extensibility model
trans-unit.target: .NET Core CLI 扩展性模型

trans-unit.source: .NET Core CLI extensibility model
trans-unit.target: .NET Core CLI 扩展性模型

trans-unit.source: CLI, extensibility, custom commands, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: CLI, 扩展性, 自定义命令, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: .NET Core CLI extensibility model
trans-unit.target: .NET Core CLI 扩展性模型

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: 概述

trans-unit.source: This document will cover the main ways how to extend the CLI tools and explain the scenarios that drive each of them.
trans-unit.target: 本文将介绍如何扩展 CLI 工具的主要方式，并解释驱动每个工具的方案。

trans-unit.source: It will the outline how to consume the tools as well as provide short notes on how to build both types of tools.
trans-unit.target: 本文档将概述如何使用这些工具并简短说明如何生成两种工具。

trans-unit.source: How to extend CLI tools
trans-unit.target: 如何扩展 CLI 工具

trans-unit.source: The CLI tools can be extended in two main ways:
trans-unit.target: 可以通过以下两种主要方式扩展 CLI 工具：

trans-unit.source: Via NuGet packages on a per-project basis
trans-unit.target: 通过基于每个项目的 NuGet 包

trans-unit.source: Via the system's PATH
trans-unit.target: 通过系统路径

trans-unit.source: The two extensibility mechanisms outlined above are not exclusive; you can use both or just one.
trans-unit.target: 上方列出的两种扩展性机制并不相互排斥；可以同时使用或单独使用。

trans-unit.source: Which one to pick depends largely on what is the goal you are trying to achieve with your extension.
trans-unit.target: 选择何种机制很大程度上取决于希望通过扩展实现的目标。

trans-unit.source: Per-project based extensibility
trans-unit.target: 基于每个项目的扩展性

trans-unit.source: Per-project tools are [portable console applications](../deploying/index.md) that are distributed as NuGet packages.
trans-unit.target: 基于项目的工具是作为 NuGet 包分布的[可移植控制台应用程序](../deploying/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Tools are only available in the context of the project that references them and for which they are restored; invocation outside of the context of the project (for example, outside of the directory that contains the project) will fail as the command will not be able to be found.
trans-unit.target: 工具仅在项目的上下文中可用，这些工具被该项目引用或为该项目还原；项目上下文外（例如，包含该项目的目录外）的调用将因无法找到命令而失败。

trans-unit.source: These tools are perfect for build servers as well, since nothing outside of `project.json` is needed.
trans-unit.target: 此外，这些工具非常适合生成服务器，因为 `project.json` 外不需要任何条件。

trans-unit.source: The build process runs restore for the project it builds and tools will be available.
trans-unit.target: 生成过程会对所生成的项目运行还原操作，并且工具可用。

trans-unit.source: Language projects, such as F#, are also in this category; after all, each project can only be written in one specific language.
trans-unit.target: 语言项目（如 F#）也属于此类别；毕竟只能采用某种特定语言编写每个项目。

trans-unit.source: Finally, this extensibility model provides support for creation of tools that need access to the built output of the project.
trans-unit.target: 最后，此扩展性模型支持创建需要访问项目生成输出的工具。

trans-unit.source: For instance, various Razor view tools in [ASP.NET](https://www.asp.net/) MVC applications fall into this category.
trans-unit.target: 例如，[ASP.NET](https://www.asp.net/) MVC 应用程序中的多种 Razor 视图工具均属于此类别。

trans-unit.source: Consuming per-project tools
trans-unit.target: 使用基于项目的工具

trans-unit.source: Consuming these tools requires you to add a `tools` node to your `project.json`.
trans-unit.target: 使用这些工具需要将 `tools` 节点添加到 `project.json`。

trans-unit.source: Inside the `tools` node, you reference the package in which the tool resides.
trans-unit.target: 在 `tools` 节点内，引用该工具所在的包。

trans-unit.source: After running `dotnet restore`, the tool and its dependencies are restored.
trans-unit.target: 运行 `dotnet restore` 后，将还原该工具及其依赖项。

trans-unit.source: For tools that need to load the build output of the project for execution, there is usually another dependency which is listed under the regular dependencies in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 对于需要加载用于执行的项目生成输出的工具，通常还有一个依赖项，它位于项目文件中的常规依赖项下。

trans-unit.source: This means that tools that load project's code have two components:
trans-unit.target: 这意味着加载项目代码的工具有两个组件：

trans-unit.source: The "tools" main invoker
trans-unit.target: “工具”主要调用程序

trans-unit.source: Any number of other tools that contain the logic to work with
trans-unit.target: 包含要使用的逻辑的任何数目的其他工具

trans-unit.source: Why two things?
trans-unit.target: 为什么需要两个组件？

trans-unit.source: Tools that need to load the build output of a project need to have unified dependency graph with the project they are working.
trans-unit.target: 需要加载项目生成输出的工具需具备所处理项目的统一依赖项关系图。

trans-unit.source: By adding the dependency bit, we enable NuGet to resolve these dependencies as a unified graph.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加依赖项位，可以使 NuGet 能够将这些依赖项解析为统一关系图。

trans-unit.source: The invoker is there because it needs to reason about the location as well as the frameworks of the dependency tool.
trans-unit.target: 调用程序存在的原因在于它需要推断出依赖项工具的位置及框架。

trans-unit.source: The invoker can accept all of the redirection arguments (`-c`, `-o`, `-b`) that the user specifies and finds the dependency tool; it can also implement any policies for cases where multiple dependency tools exist for multiple frameworks (that is, does it run all of them, just one, etc.) In general, logic can be shared between these two tools any way that is needed.
trans-unit.target: 调用程序可以接受用户指定和查找依赖项工具所用的所有重定向参数（`-c`、`-o`、`-b`）；还可以在多个框架中存在多个依赖项工具情况下实现各种策略（即运行所有工具或仅一个工具等）通常，可采用所需的任何方式在这两种工具之间共享逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Let's review an example of adding a simple tools-only tool to a simple project.
trans-unit.target: 我们来看看将简单的工具专用工具添加到简单项目的示例。

trans-unit.source: Given an example command called `dotnet-api-search` that allows you to search through the NuGet packages for the specified API, here is a console application's `project.json` file that uses that tool:
trans-unit.target: 假定示例命令称为 `dotnet-api-search`，它可使你搜索指定 API 的所有 NuGet 包，以下是使用该工具的控制台应用程序 `project.json` 文件：

trans-unit.source: The `tools` node is structured in a similar way as the `dependencies` node.
trans-unit.target: `tools` 节点采用与 `dependencies` 节点相同的方式进行结构化。

trans-unit.source: It needs the package ID of the package containing the tool and its version at the very least.
trans-unit.target: 它需要至少包含该工具及其版本的包的包 ID。

trans-unit.source: In the example above, we can see that there is another statement, the `imports` one.
trans-unit.target: 在上述示例中，我们可以看到另一语句，即 `imports`。

trans-unit.source: This influences the tool's restore process and specifies that the tool is also compatible, in addition to any targeted frameworks the tools has, with `dnxcore50` target.
trans-unit.target: 这会影响该工具的还原过程，并指定除工具本身所含任何目标框架外，它还与 `dnxcore50` 目标兼容。

trans-unit.source: For more information you can consult the [project.json reference](project-json.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，可以参阅 [project.json 引用](project-json.md)。

trans-unit.source: Building tools
trans-unit.target: 生成工具

trans-unit.source: As mentioned, tools are just portable console applications.
trans-unit.target: 如前所述，工具仅仅是可移植控制台应用程序。

trans-unit.source: You would build one as you would build any console application.
trans-unit.target: 可以采用与生成控制台应用程序类似的方式生成此工具。

trans-unit.source: After you build it, you would use [`dotnet pack`](dotnet-pack.md) command to create a NuGet package (nupkg) that contains your code, information about its dependencies and so on.
trans-unit.target: 生成后，使用 [`dotnet pack`](dotnet-pack.md) 命令创建 NuGet 包 (nupkg)，其中包含代码和依赖项等相关信息。

trans-unit.source: The package name can be whatever the author wants, but the application inside, the actual tool binary, has to conform to the convention of `dotnet-<command>` in order for `dotnet` to be able to invoke it.
trans-unit.target: 作者可以随意命名包，但内部应用程序（即实际的工具二进制文件）必须遵循 `dotnet-<command>` 的约定以便 `dotnet` 能够调用它。

trans-unit.source: Since tools are portable applications, the user consuming the tool has to have the version of the .NET Core libraries that the tool was built against in order to run the tool.
trans-unit.target: 由于工具是可移植应用程序，使用该工具的用户必须拥有生成该工具时所针对的 .NET Core 库版本，以便运行此工具。

trans-unit.source: Any other dependency that the tool uses and that is not contained within the .NET Core libraries is restored and placed in the NuGet cache.
trans-unit.target: 工具使用的以及 .NET Core 库未包含的其他任何依赖项均被还原并放置在 NuGet 缓存中。

trans-unit.source: The entire tool is, therefore, run using the assemblies from the .NET Core libraries as well as assemblies from the NuGet cache.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用 .NET Core 库和 NuGet 缓存中的程序集可以运行整个工具。

trans-unit.source: These kind of tools have a dependency graph that is completely separate from the dependency graph of the project that uses them.
trans-unit.target: 这些类型的工具含有依赖项关系图，它完全独立于使用这些工具的项目的依赖项关系图。

trans-unit.source: The restore process will first restore the project's dependencies, and will then restore each of the tools and their dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 还原过程将首先还原项目依赖项，然后还原每个工具及其依赖项。

trans-unit.source: You can find richer examples and different combinations of this in the [.NET Core CLI repo](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/tree/rel/1.0.0-preview2/TestAssets/TestProjects).
trans-unit.target: 可在 [.NET Core CLI 存储库](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/tree/rel/1.0.0-preview2/TestAssets/TestProjects)中找到有关此过程的更多示例和不同组合。

trans-unit.source: You can also see the [implementation of tools used](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/tree/rel/1.0.0-preview2/TestAssets/TestPackages) in the same repo.
trans-unit.target: 还可以在相同存储库中查看[所用工具的实现](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/tree/rel/1.0.0-preview2/TestAssets/TestPackages)。

trans-unit.source: Building tools that load project's build outputs for execution is slightly different.
trans-unit.target: 加载用于执行的项目生成输出的生成工具略有不同。

trans-unit.source: As stated, for these kinds of tools there are two components:
trans-unit.target: 如上所述，这些类型的工具有两个组件：

trans-unit.source: A dispatcher tool that the user invokes
trans-unit.target: 一个是用户调用的调度程序工具

trans-unit.source: A framework-specific dependency that contains the logic on how to find the build outputs and what to do with it
trans-unit.target: 另一个是特定于框架的依赖项，其中包含有关如何找到并处理生成输出的逻辑

trans-unit.source: A prime example of this are [Entity Framework (EF)](https://github.com/aspnet/EntityFramework) commands as well as the [`dotnet test`](dotnet-test.md) command.
trans-unit.target: 这方面的典型示例是[实体框架 (EF)](https://github.com/aspnet/EntityFramework) 命令以及 [`dotnet test`](dotnet-test.md) 命令。

trans-unit.source: In both cases, there is a tool that is referenced in the `tools` node of the `project.json` and that is the main dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: 无论哪种情况都有一个在 `project.json` 的 `tools` 节点中引用的工具，即主调度程序。

trans-unit.source: The user invokes this tool on the command line.
trans-unit.target: 用户可在命令行调用此工具。

trans-unit.source: The second piece of the puzzle is the dependency that is given in the project's main dependencies (either root ones or framework-specific ones).
trans-unit.target: 拼图的第二块是项目主依赖项（根依赖项或特定于框架的依赖项）中提供的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: This package contains the actual logic of the tool.
trans-unit.target: 此包含有工具的实际逻辑。

trans-unit.source: The package is a normal dependency, thus it will be restored as part of the restore process for the project.
trans-unit.target: 包属于普通依赖项，因此会将其作为项目还原过程的一部分进行还原。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the previous kind of tools, these tool are actually part of the graph of the project that consumes them.
trans-unit.target: 不同于前面几种工具，这些工具实际上属于使用它们的项目的关系图。

trans-unit.source: This is because they need access to the project's code and potentially all of its dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为它们需要访问项目代码并且可能访问所有依赖项。

trans-unit.source: For instance, the EF tools need this because they need to scan the assemblies to find the code they need, such as migrations.
trans-unit.target: 例如，EF 工具需要此项的原因在于它们需要扫描程序集以查找所需代码，如迁移。

trans-unit.source: Another reason why this two-pronged solution exists is to allow a cleaner invocation model.
trans-unit.target: 存在此双管齐下的解决方案的另一个原因是可实现更简洁的调用模型。

trans-unit.source: Most CLI commands that drop certain artifacts on disk (for example, `dotnet build`, `dotnet publish`) allow users to redirect the outputs to a different path using the `--output` argument or `--build-base-path` argument or `--configuration` argument.
trans-unit.target: 将某些项目放置在磁盘上的大多数 CLI 命令（例如，`dotnet build`、`dotnet publish`）都允许用户使用 `--output` 参数、`--build-base-path` 参数或 `--configuration` 参数将输出重定向到不同路径。

trans-unit.source: For EF tools, for example, to be able to find the build output of your project, you would have to provide the same arguments with the same values to *both* `dotnet` driver as well as the `ef` command.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要使 EF 工具能够找到项目的生成输出，必须同时向 `dotnet` 驱动程序以及 `ef` 命令提供具有相同值的相同参数。

trans-unit.source: With the invocation model, the users pass any arguments to the dispatcher tool which can then use that to find the needed binary that contains the logic in the output directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用调用模型，用户可以将任何参数传递到调度程序工具，此工具可以在之后使用该模型查找所需的包含输出目录中的逻辑的二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: A good example of this approach can be found in the [.NET Core CLI repo](https://github.com/dotnet/cli):
trans-unit.target: 可在 [.NET Core CLI 存储库](https://github.com/dotnet/cli)中找到此方法的良好示例：

trans-unit.source: [Sample project.json file](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/TestAssets/DesktopTestProjects/AppWithDirectDependencyDesktopAndPortable/project.json)
trans-unit.target: [示例 project.json 文件](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/blob/rel/1.0.0-preview2/TestAssets/DesktopTestProjects/AppWithDirectDependencyDesktopAndPortable/project.json)

trans-unit.source: [Implementation of the dispatcher](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/tree/rel/1.0.0-preview2/TestAssets/TestPackages/dotnet-dependency-tool-invoker)
trans-unit.target: [调度程序的实现](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/tree/rel/1.0.0-preview2/TestAssets/TestPackages/dotnet-dependency-tool-invoker)

trans-unit.source: [Implementation of the framework-specific dependency](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/tree/rel/1.0.0-preview2/TestAssets/TestPackages/dotnet-desktop-and-portable)
trans-unit.target: [特定于框架的依赖项的实现](https://github.com/dotnet/cli/tree/rel/1.0.0-preview2/TestAssets/TestPackages/dotnet-desktop-and-portable)

trans-unit.source: PATH-based extensibility
trans-unit.target: 基于路径的扩展

trans-unit.source: PATH-based extensibility is usually used for development machines where you need a tool that conceptually covers more than a single project.
trans-unit.target: 基于路径的扩展常用于开发计算机，此计算机需要在概念上涵盖多个项目的工具。

trans-unit.source: The main drawback of this extensions mechanism is that it is tied to the machine where the tool exists.
trans-unit.target: 此扩展机制的主要缺点在于必须将其关联到工具所在的计算机。

trans-unit.source: If you need it on another machine, you would have to deploy it.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他计算机上需要该机制，则必须对其进行部署。

trans-unit.source: This pattern of CLI toolset extensibility is very simple.
trans-unit.target: 此 CLI 工具集扩展的模式就非常简单。

trans-unit.source: As covered in the [.NET Core CLI overview](index.md), `dotnet` driver can run any command that is named after the `dotnet-<command>` convention.
trans-unit.target: 正如 [.NET Core CLI 概述](index.md)中所述，`dotnet` 驱动程序可以运行以 `dotnet-<command>` 约定命名的任何命令。

trans-unit.source: The default resolution logic will first probe several locations and will finally fall to the system PATH.
trans-unit.target: 默认的解析逻辑将首先探测多个位置，最后探测系统路径。

trans-unit.source: If the requested command exists in the system PATH and is a binary that can be invoked, `dotnet` driver will invoke it.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求的命令存在于系统路径中并且属于可调用的二进制文件，则 `dotnet` 驱动程序将调用它。

trans-unit.source: The binary can be pretty much anything that the operating system can execute.
trans-unit.target: 该二进制文件几乎可以是操作系统可以执行的任何内容。

trans-unit.source: On Unix systems, this means anything that has the execute bit set via `chmod +x`.
trans-unit.target: 在 Unix 系统上，这表示通过 `chmod +x` 设置了执行位的任何内容。

trans-unit.source: On Windows it means anything that Windows knows how to run.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 上，这表示 Windows 知道如何运行的任何内容。

trans-unit.source: As an example, let's take a look at a very simple implementation of a `dotnet clean` command.
trans-unit.target: 例如，我们来看看非常简单的 `dotnet clean` 命令的实现。

trans-unit.source: We will use `bash` to implement this command.
trans-unit.target: 我们将使用 `bash` 来实现此命令。

trans-unit.source: The command will simply delete the `bin/` and `obj/` directories in the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 该命令仅删除当前目录中的 `bin/` 和 `obj/`。

trans-unit.source: If the `--lock` argument is passed to it, it will also delete `project.lock.json` file.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 `--lock` 参数传递给它，也会删除 `project.lock.json` 文件。

trans-unit.source: The entirety of the command is given below.
trans-unit.target: 下方给出了整个命令。

trans-unit.source: On macOS, we can save this script as `dotnet-clean` and set its executable bit with `chmod +x dotnet-clean`.
trans-unit.target: 在 macOS 上，可以将此脚本另存为 `dotnet-clean` 并使用 `chmod +x dotnet-clean` 设置其可执行位。

trans-unit.source: We can then create a symbolic link to it in `/usr/local/bin` using the command `ln -s dotnet-clean /usr/local/bin/`.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以使用命令 `ln -s dotnet-clean /usr/local/bin/` 在 `/usr/local/bin` 中创建其符号链接。

trans-unit.source: This will make it possible to invoke the clean command using the `dotnet clean` syntax.
trans-unit.target: 这样，就可以使用 `dotnet clean` 语法调用 clean 命令。

trans-unit.source: You can test this by creating an app, running `dotnet build` on it and then running `dotnet clean`.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过创建应用、在其中运行 `dotnet build`，然后运行 `dotnet clean` 来对此进行测试。

trans-unit.source: Conclusion
trans-unit.target: 结束语

trans-unit.source: The .NET Core CLI tools allow two main extensibility points.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core CLI 工具允许两个主要扩展点。

trans-unit.source: The per-project tools are contained within the project's context, but they allow easy installation through restoration.
trans-unit.target: 基于项目的工具包含在项目上下文中，但允许通过还原轻松安装。

trans-unit.source: PATH-based tools are good for general, cross-project tools that are usable on a single machine.
trans-unit.target: 基于路径的工具非常适合可在一台计算机上使用的常规、跨项目工具。
